title: BIKER
description: A good girl desperate for a fresh start, willing to do anything to escape her past.A bad ass criminal and hardened brother of the Widowmakers MC just trying to stay alive.When Noel first lays eyes on Blaze all she can think about is how fucking sexy he is. The bad boy's charm and dangerous allure immediately sweep her off her feet. It all seems to be going perfectly...until he holds a gun to her head.This biker romance contains adult themes, violence, and sexual content.
author: Ashley Harma
